actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations

official_title: A bill to provide for payment to members of the Armed Forces of compensation at the rate of $10 per day for each day spent in hiding during World War II to evade capture by the enemy.

summary.text: Amends the War Claims Act of 1948 to authorize the War Claims Commission to pay an evader $10 for each day such person spent in hiding during World War II to evade capture.

titles.title: A bill to provide for payment to members of the Armed Forces of compensation at the rate of $10 per day for each day spent in hiding during World War II to evade capture by the enemy.
